explanation:
code_hardening: Added a minimal null-check for the input object to avoid passing null into the reachability traversal; no other defensive changes were introduced.
resolve_compilation_errors: Aligned the constructor with the existing ReachableObjects class and its already-declared fields and collectAllReachableObjects method; no new types or APIs were required.
exception_handling: Preserved the existing try/catch structure and behavior (printing stack traces) while only adjusting formatting; no new exception types were added.
logic_customization: None; the reachability collection and removeAll sequencing remains identical to the original logic.
refactoring: None beyond whitespace and brace/parenthesis formatting; no renaming or structural changes were applied.
misc: Normalized indentation, brace placement, and removed spaces inside catch parentheses to match the stated formatting/style intent.
